Firebase + Google Sign In Use a Google Sign In credential to authenticate with Firebase.
Firebase + Facebook Login Use a Facebook Login credential to authenticate with Firebase.
Firebase + Twitter Login Use a Twitter Login credential to authenticate with Firebase.
Email/Password Authentication Use an email and password to authenticate with Firebase.
Phone Number Authentication Use a phone number to authenticate with Firebase.
Anonymous Authentication Sign in anonymously and then later upgrade to a full Firebase Auth user.
Custom Authentication Use a custom token signed by your own server to authenticate with Firebase.
FirebaseUI Auth Use the FirebaseUI-Android library to authenticate with Firebase.
